title: Portfolio Website
description: Developed this portfolio website where you are currently reading these projects. A user-focused web application built in React.js and Bootstrap and hosted via github's static pages. Though the domain is through Squarespace and the reverse proxy is done via a GCP server. Along with a development pipeline through Github Actions updating based on the main branch being updated. All of this is hosted via Github and is open-source, so anyone can view the source code for this website.
